titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: NUMBER OF NODES POSITIVE (INGUINO-FEMORAL) - Description

div.p: NUMBER OF NODES POSITIVE (INGUINO-FEMORAL) is the number of inguino-femoral nodes (nodes pertaining to both the inguen (groin) and the femur) reported as being positive for the presence of Tumour metastases during a Gynaecological Cancer Care Spell.
